problems.title: Second Largest Element
problems.description: Write a Java program to find the second largest element in an array. If there is no second largest element (e.g., all elements are equal or array size < 2), print "None".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
1 2 3 4 5

Sample Output
4

Sample Input
3
1 1 1

Sample Output
None
hintsList: Find the largest element first, then find the largest element smaller than the first largest.
